title: FPS Problems
body:
Since today after accepting terms and conditions I loaded a custom game and only had 4 fps max instead of the normal 60+.

I have updated all my drivers and tried everything I could think of to fix it but still 4 fps the only thing different from yesterday is that I accepted terms and conditions.

Any help would be appreciated

replies.body:
FPS issues like this can be caused by outdated drivers, so updating them was a solid step.  There may be other factors as well, like hardware or bad game files.  There's also been a recent Windows 10 update that auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), which has been causing fps issues for some players.  Disabling that may the issue fixed!

Otherwise, check out each step in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to get that fixed up, and to make sure that your files are tuned up to play.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I did everything in the FPS issues guide, disabled the Xbox Game Bar, settings to minimum ingame and from my pc i reinstalled League of Legends but still only 3 fps instead of the regular 60+ from yesterday. Any more solutions happy to try them

Thanks for the update!  Since the issue persists, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and attach it to your ticket to give us more context.  Our tech team will help out!
